data.title: About Us
data.meta_description: West Coast Electrical & Lighting Services is a mid-sized contractor with the experience, knowledge and resources to satisfy all your commercial electrical service needs.  For over 25 years we’ve provided quality workmanship to area businesses ...
data.text:
West Coast Electrical & Lighting Services is a mid-sized contractor with the experience, knowledge and resources to satisfy all your commercial electrical service needs. For over 25 years we’ve provided quality workmanship to area businesses and residential communities.

We’d be glad to talk with you about your project and provide a free estimate. First, here’s some additional information about us:

COMPANY BACKGROUND

Company History – West Coast Electrical & Lighting Services was founded in 1988 in Fort Myers, Florida by Bernie Murphy, who today still owns and operates the company. Originally called “West Coast Fire Equipment,” Bernie and his team focused on providing fire alarms and extinguishers to businesses and residential communities, but soon expanded to emergency lighting and then all types of commercial lighting.

Corporate Philosophy – Do it right. It’s a simple philosophy but one we embrace with conviction. Our technicians follow stated procedures for every task. They work safe and don’t take shortcuts. High standards help set us apart from other electrical companies, which is how we’ve thrived for 25+ years.

OUR CAPABILITIES

New Lighting — We design, build, install and service lighting for building exteriors and common areas.

Emergency Services — We offer emergency services 24/7, 365 days a year. Call us any day, any time. You will always get a human, not voicemail. Our service technicians will be dispatched to your location immediately.

Troubleshooting & More – We excel at diagnosing electrical problems and performing repairs. We also do wiring, install equipment, provide on-going maintenance, and develop plans for energy-efficient retrofits.

Fire Alarm Checks – We’re certified to conduct the annual fire alarm inspections and repairs required by law.

Unique Abilities – Our experience with electrical work extends to highly technical projects. For example, we can install the complex electrical wiring system needed for CAT scan machines in hospitals. We also do industrial work such as motor and control wiring, NOVAR energy management controls, and installation and service for variable frequency drives (VFDs). No matter how specialized or challenging your electrical needs, we are capable of doing the work.

National Accounts – We offer electrical and fire alarm services for national account maintenance firms that provide services for major chain stores and retailers across the U.S.

Guarantee — West Coast Lighting proudly stands behind its work. We offer a one-year guarantee on parts and labor on everything we install.

ADDITIONAL OFFERINGS

Maintenance Contracts – Choose a monthly, quarterly or annual maintenance contract. We’ll inspect all lighting and electrical systems, perform routine maintenance and make repairs as needed.

Energy Audits – Energy efficiency is always a part of the equation when we select, install and service lighting. We also do energy audits. We’ll even show you the savings for any options we recommend.

Wholesale Pricing on Electrical Products – Because of our long-term relationships with lighting manufacturers as well as the volume we do, we can offer many products at wholesale prices including: light fixtures, bulbs, ballasts and electrical replacement parts.

OUR CUSTOMERS

Service Areas — We serve Ft. Myers, Naples, Bonita Springs, Cape Coral, Labelle, Punta Gorda and Port Charlotte and other locales throughout Charlotte, Lee, Hendry, and Collier County.

Customer Base – We currently service over 2,000 customers. They include condominium communities, commercial facilities, churches, hotels, storage facilities, parking garages, retailers, restaurants, hospitals, bingo halls, industrial facilities, government buildings and more.

Who We Work With — Property managers, building owners, project managers, architects, engineers and general contractors choose West Coast Lighting because they know we’ll bring the project in on time and within budget.

Estimates – We provide free quotes on service work. For upgrades and retrofits we will provide a spreadsheet showing your payback and your return on investment.

OUR EMPLOYEES

Employees – Our technicians arrive on schedule and complete work in a timely manner. Most have been with the company for more than five years; all have been background checked. They are courteous and respectful of your property, always cleaning the jobsite before they leave.

Training – Our technicians are experienced commercial service electricians. We’ve trained them in our methods of troubleshooting and repairs, ensuring consistent high standards in our workmanship. Additionally, they receive continuous training in electrical installations, products, code requirements and safety.

EQUIPMENT & INVENTORY

Vehicles – Our trucks are fully stocked with hundreds of parts, allowing our technicians to complete most repair jobs in one visit.

Inventory – Our warehouse is stocked with over 16,000 items to ensure we have the product or part you need on hand. We use only quality parts proven to function well and last.

Specialty Equipment – Our two aerial lifts enable us to do work 61 feet in the air. We also have Dynatel underground locaters and fault locaters as well as Meggers for testing wire insulation deterioration. Our staff is well trained in how to effectively use this equipment.

SAFETY & SECURITY

Safety – We are proud of our exceptional safety record. We’ve had no serious injuries in our company’s history, which dates back to 1988. Our employees know we insist they “work safe,” and our training includes best practices for safety.

Insurance – West Coast Lighting is fully insured, and licensed. Our employees all have workman’s comp coverage.
